Variations of proxy data and model results over the past 1.7 Ma. a Summer insolation at 65°N
55 . b Simulated mean annual precipitation (MAP) and c mean annual temperature (MAT) over the northern China. d JY loess δ 13C IC record. e Benthic δ 18O stack
